plugins.name: compound-teams
plugins.description: Compound engineering workflow using Agent Teams with embedded Ralph Loops. Commands: /ct:setup (safe install into existing projects), /ct:plan (research + plan), /ct:build (Agent Team execution with Ralph loops), /ct:review (multi-lens code review team), /ct:quick (fast builds), /ct:compound (extract learnings). Skills: ralph-loop (persistent retry-until-green pattern), compound-learning (CLAUDE.md knowledge management).
